headline.main: 8,000 AT MEETING URGE AID TO RUSSIA; Gathering Under Auspices of Soviet Relations Council Asks Cooperation CORLISS LAMONT SPEAKS Says Red Nation Is Bulwark Against Nazism -- Parents Attend the Rally

lead_paragraph: A resolution pledging "full and unstinting support to the Soviet Union in its struggle to defend its land, its people and its freedom" was adopted last night at a mass meeting at Madison Square Garden sponsored by the American Council on Soviet Relations.
abstract: With wife hears son, C, s
